H0.text: Red Stripe lager comes from which country. Barbados

H1.text: Red Stripe lager comes from which country. Trinidad and Tobago

H2.text: Red Stripe lager comes from which country. Bahamas

H3.text: Red Stripe lager comes from which country. Jamica

A4.text: Red Stripe is a 4.7% ABV pale lager brewed by Desnoes & Geddes in Jamaica and the Netherlands.

A5.text: It was still being imported to the U.S. in 2023, from Jamaica in bottles, and the Netherlands in kegs and cans.
